game.name: Sonic Adventure 2
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Experience two unique adventures featuring both long-time heroes and new and returning villains as they battle for the fate of the world!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Experience two unique adventures featuring both long-time heroes and new and returning villains as they battle for the fate of the world!

reviewHighlights.text: 너클즈 파트랑 루즈 파트가 너무 어려워서 비추천.
